concept.title: Salesforce
concept.shortdesc: The Salesforce destination writes data to Salesforce objects.

conbody.p: Salesforce destinationoverviewdestinationsSalesforceWhen you configure the Salesforce destination, you define connection information, including the API type and version that the destination uses to connect to Salesforce.

You specify the Salesforce object to write to by entering the object name or by defining an expression that evaluates to the object name. You also map incoming fields in the record to existing fields in the Salesforce object.
You can optionally use an HTTP proxy to connect to Salesforce.
